mim.author: ETXJOTJ
mim.name: RmeExeR
mim.description: This model contains actions on the node.

enumMember.name: PLANNED_RECONFIGURATION
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to perform planned activities such as reconfigurations.

enumMember.name: UNPLANNED_NODE_EXTERNAL_PROBLEMS
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to resolve node external problems.

enumMember.name: UNPLANNED_NODE_UPGRADE_PROBLEMS
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to resolve upgrade problems.

enumMember.name: UNPLANNED_O_AND_M_ISSUE
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to resolve O&M issues.

enumMember.name: UNPLANNED_CYCLIC_RECOVERY
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to stop further auto recovery attempts.

enumMember.name: UNPLANNED_COLD_WITH_HW_TEST
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to perform HW tests.

enumMember.name: UNPLANNED_LOW_COVERAGE
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to improve Cell Availability.

enumMember.name: OPERATOR_CLASSIFIED_PROBLEMS
enumMember.description: Restart ordered to resolve procedural errors or office environmental problems. Example: power, grounding, temperature, humidity or security problems.

enum.name: RestartRank
enum.description: Restart ranks. Currently RESTART_WARM and RESTART_COLDWTEST are not used for virtual nodes vRC and vPP.

enumMember.name: RESTART_WARM
enumMember.description: Restarts the node with the same software. The software is not reloaded from the disk. The traffic is affected least as warm restart is faster and no hardware is reset.

enumMember.name: RESTART_COLD
enumMember.description: Reloads the software from the disk, restarts the node, and resets all the physical or virtual hardware. The traffic is affected more than for a warm restart.

enumMember.name: RESTART_COLDWTEST
enumMember.description: Reloads the software from the disk, restarts the node, and resets and tests the physical hardware. The traffic is affected most.

derivedDataType.name: Uuid
derivedDataType.description:
A universally unique identifier (UUID)
The UUID is a 16-octet (128-bit) number represented as a series of hexadecimal digits 0-9,a-f in groups separated by hyphen in groups of 8-4-4-4-12

class.name: ExecutionResource
class.description: This MO class contains actions on the node.

parameter.name: restartRank
parameter.description: The restart rank. CURRENTLY NOT USED FOR VIRTUAL NODES vRC and vPP.

parameter.name: restartInfo
parameter.description: A free text field where extra information can be added.

attribute.name: executionResourceId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: vnfIdentity
attribute.description:
VNF identifier for this ME.
The VNF identifier is assigned by the VNF manager when creating or upgrading the VNF instance.
